content.rendered:
The professionals in this directory are those that have joined HLAA as Professionals Members. HLAA neither endorses individuals or businesses included here nor does exclusion imply disapproval. 

Be sure to see Ida Telecare, tools to help people with hearing loss to articulate their unique needs and circumstances to their hearing care professional. Thank you to the Ida Institute for making the Tools easily accessible to visitors of this site.
